TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit MediaCommands extends System.Object
public ref class MediaCommands abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供一組標準的媒體相關命令。

span.span: Provides a standard set of media related commands.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的命令類別和其他的命令命令程式庫類別，例如和，用來表示一組應用程式的程式設計人員經常遇到的常見命令。The commands in the class and commands in the other command library classes, such as and , are intended to represent a set of common commands that application programmers encounter frequently. 命令只代表執行個體並不是命令的實作邏輯。The commands only represent the instance of the and not the implementation logic for the command. 實作邏輯繫結至透過命令。The implementation logic is bound to the command via a . 例如，如果（命令目標），它會執行的邏輯控制項上執行命令命令可能無法提供的命令目標，因此應用程式寫入器會負責編寫邏輯決定如何在命令目標會處理命令。For example, if the command is executed on a control (the command target), the logic which performs the command may not be provided by the command target, so the application writer will be responsible for writing the logic that determines how the command target will handle the command. 許多控制項仍提供許多命令程式庫中的命令的實作邏輯。Many controls do provide implementation logic for many of the commands in the command library. 例如，類別會提供邏輯命令，命令，命令，命令，和命令。For example, the class provides logic for the command, command, command, command, and command. 如需有關命令和命令，請參閱[命令概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/commanding-overview.md)。For more information on commands and commanding see the [Commanding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/commanding-overview.md).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property BoostBass As RoutedUICommand
public: static property System::Windows::Input::RoutedUICommand ^ BoostBass { System::Windows::Input::RoutedUICommand ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得表示 Boost Base 命令的值。

span.span: Gets the value that represents the Boost Base command.
The command.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個命令表示要切換開啟或關閉低音加強。This command indicates the intention to toggle the bass boost on or off. 不一定會回應任何指定的物件; 上的命令實際實作在許多情況下的實作，該命令的回應會是應用程式寫入器的責任。There is not necessarily an actual implementation responding to the command on any given object; in many cases the implementation in response to that command is the responsibility of the application writer. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```
